Snapshots/api/snapshotstop

A collection of all snapshots.

Resource

Snapshot object
  • cluster string
    The cluster who owns the snapshot.
  • id integer
    The snapshot id.
  • image string
    The image which has been snapshotted.
  • name string
    The snapshot name.
  • pool string
    The pool who owns the snapshot.
  • size integer
    Size in bytes of the snapshot.

Paths

/api/snapshots
  • GET
    get
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/snapshots/{name}
  • GET
    get
    Path Parameters
    • name string
      name
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found

Images/api/imagestop

A collection of all OS images.

Resource

Image object
  • arch string
    The CPU architecture the Image is built for.
  • distrib_codename string
    The distribution codename of the Image.
  • distrib_description string
    The distribution description of the Image.
  • distrib_id string
    The distribution ID of the Image.
  • distrib_release string
    The distribution release of the Image.
  • group string
    The group to which the Image belongs.
  • image_filename string
    The full path to this Image.
  • image_name string
    The name of the Image.
  • init_system string
    The init system used by this Image.
  • kernel_release string
    The kernel release of the Image.
  • org_id string
    The globally unique organization identifier for owner of the image.
  • server_address string
    The address of the server where the Image is located.

Paths

/api/images
  • GET
    get
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/images/{name}
  • GET
    get
    Path Parameters
    • name string
      name
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found

Components/api/componentstop

A collection of components within the cloud platform.

Resource

Component object
  • completed string
  • id string
  • initiated string
  • message string
  • name string
  • status string QUEUED PREPARING DEPLOYING DEPLOYED BRING_UP UP BRING_DOWN DOWN DESTROYING DESTROYED CANCELED FAILED DELETING DELETED

Paths

/api/components
  • GET
    Get all components
    Query Parameters
    • name string
      name
    • typeId int32
      typeId
    • type string
      type
    • enclosureId int32
      enclosureId
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/components/{componentId}
  • GET
    Get component by id
    Path Parameters
    • componentId int64
      componentId
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found

Versions/api/versionstop

A collection of all supported API versions.

Resource

Version object
  • consumes array
    The mime types supported by POST and PUT in this version of the API.
  • produces array
    The mime types returnable by this version of the API.
  • version string
    The version number of the API.

Paths

/api/versions
  • GET
    get
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found

Metrics/api/metricstop

A collection of metrics related to the cloud platform.

Resource

Metric object
  • component_id
    The globally-unique identifier of the component that originated the metric.
  • enclosure_id integer
    The globally-unique identifier of the enclosure that originated the metric.
  • timestamp string
    The ISO8601 formatted timestamp of the metric.
  • type string
    The type or category of the metric.
  • value number
    The value of the metric.

Paths

/api/metrics
  • GET
    get
    Query Parameters
    • cursorTtl int64
      60000cursorTtl
    • cursorId string
      cursorId
    • types array
      *types
    • pageSize int32
      100pageSize
    • page int32
      0page
    • to int64
      to
    • from int64
      from
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/metrics/cursor
  • GET
    prepareCursor
    Query Parameters
    • types array
      *types
    • itemsPerGet int32
      1000itemsPerGet
    • ttl int64
      60000ttl
    • to int64
      to
    • from int64
      from
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/metrics/keys
  • GET
    get
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/metrics/keys/{key}
  • GET
    get
    Path Parameters
    • key string
      key
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found

Events/api/eventstop

A collection of events related to the cloud platform.

Resource

Event object
  • enclosure_id integer
  • id string
    The id of the Event.
  • properties object
    All properties relating to the Event.
  • timestamp string
    The ISO8601 formatted timestamp of the event.
  • type string
    The type or category of the Event.

Paths

/api/events
  • GET
    get
    Query Parameters
    • size int32
      100size
    • page int32
      0page
    • query string
      *:*query
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found

Commands/api/commandstop

A collection of all Commands.

Resource

Command object
  • completed string
    The date and time that the Command completed (if it has).
  • id string
    An auto-generated unique identifier of the Command.
  • ims_instance_id string
    The instance id of the IMS node that originated the Command.
  • initiated string
    The date and time when the Command was initiated.
  • initiated_by string
    The Name of the uer who initiated the Command.
  • last_updated string
    The date and time that the Command was last updated.
  • message string
    The current human-readable message about the state of the Command.
  • metadata object
    A dictionary of metadata associated with the Command.
  • org_id string
    The identifier for the organization to which the Command is applicable.
  • properties object
    A dictionary of properties applicable to the Command.
  • status string QUEUED PREPARING EXECUTING FAILED SUCCESSFUL CANCELLED
    The current status of the Command.
  • type string
    The type of Command to be performed.
  • valid boolean
    A value indicating whether or not a Command has passed validation.
  • validation_messages array
    A list of messages resulting from the validation of the Command.

Paths

/api/commands
  • GET
    Query the Commands collection.
    Query Parameters
    • size int32
      100size
    • page int32
      0page
    • query string
      *:*query
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
  • POST
    Create a new Command.
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 201 Created
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/commands/{id}
  • GET
    Retrieve a specific Command.
    Path Parameters
    • id string
      id
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found

Definition object

  • stores array

Resource Modules/api/resource_modulestop

A collection of all resource modules.

Resource

Resource Module object
  • connected boolean
    A value indicating whether the Resource Module is connected.
  • deployment_id string
    The globally-unique identifier of the Deployment using the Resource Module.
  • embedded_storage_read_speed integer
    The read speed of the embedded storage.
  • embedded_storage_type string
    The type of embedded storage available to the Resource Module.(0 = NAND, 1 = SATA)
  • embedded_storage_write_cycles integer
    The estimated number of write cycles the of embedded storagewas designed for.
  • embedded_storage_write_speed integer
    The write speed of the embedded storage.
  • enclosure_id integer
    The globally-unique identifier of the Enclosure housing theResource Module.
  • ethernet_port_map object
    A map of interfaces to their connected switch ports.
  • first_connected string
    An ISO 8601 timestamp identifying the first time a Resource Module was connected.
  • last_connected string
    An ISO 8601 timestamp identifying the last time a Resource Module was connected.
  • master_cpu_arch string
    The architecture of the Resource Module's master CPU
  • master_cpu_arch_version string
    The architecture version of the Resource Module's master CPU
  • master_cpu_core_count integer
    The number of cores in the Resource Module's master CPU
  • master_cpu_datapath_width string
    The data path width of the Resource Module's master CPU
  • master_cpu_integer_width string
    The integer width of the Resource Module's master CPU
  • master_cpu_memory_addr_width string
    The memory address width of the Resource Module's master CPU
  • maximum_input_voltage number
    The maximum input voltage supported by the Resource Module.
  • maximum_power integer
    The maximum power draw in watts.
  • minimum_input_voltage number
    The minimum input voltage supported by the Resource Module.
  • module_function string
  • module_index integer
    The index of the slot a module is current attached to.
  • pcie_lane_per_link string
    The number of PCIe lanes per link.
  • pcie_link_count string
    The total number of PCIe links available.
  • pcie_version string
    The version of PCIe the Resoure Module supports.
  • power_state string ON OFF UNKNOWN COMING_UP GOING_DOWN
    The current power state of the Resource Module.
  • ram_amount integer
    The amount of RAM currently allocated to the Resource Module.
  • ram_speed integer
    The speed of the RAM the Resource Module has access to.
  • resource_pool_id string
    The globally-unique identifier of the Resource Pool to which the Resource Module belongs.
  • serial_number string
    The serial number of the Resource Module.
  • slave_cpu_arch string
    The architecture of the Resource Module's slave CPU
  • slave_cpu_arch_version string
    The architecture version of the Resource Module's slave CPU
  • slave_cpu_core_count integer
    The number of cores in the Resource Module's slave CPU
  • slave_cpu_datapath_width string
    The data path width of the Resource Module's slave CPU
  • slave_cpu_integer_width string
    The integer width of the Resource Module's slave CPU
  • slave_cpu_memory_addr_width string
    The memory address width of the Resource Module's slave CPU
  • updated string
    An ISO 8601 timestamp identifying the last time a Resource Module's state was changed.

Paths

/api/resource_modules
  • GET
    get
    Query Parameters
    • serial_numbers string
      serial_numbers
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/resource_modules/{serialNumber}
  • GET
    get
    Path Parameters
    • serialNumber string
      serialNumber
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
  • PUT
    put
    Path Parameters
    • serialNumber string
      serialNumber
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 201 Created
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found

  • id string

  • message string
  • org_id string
  • resource_pool_id string
  • status string QUEUED PREPARING DEPLOYING DEPLOYED BRING_UP UP BRING_DOWN DOWN DESTROYING DESTROYED CANCELED FAILED DELETING DELETED

Instances/api/instancestop

A collection of all instances

Resource

Instance object
  • admin_status string UNDEPLOYED CHECK_DEPLOY_REQUIRED DEPLOYING UNDEPLOYING DEPLOYED_FS DEPLOYED UP DOWN BOOTING GOING_DOWN ORPHANED
    The recognized target Instance status.
  • base_image string
    The base image used for this Instance.
  • component_deployment_id string
    The locally-unique identifier for the initiating component deployment.
  • deleted boolean
  • deployment_id string
    The globally-unique identifier for the initiating deployment.
  • hostname string
    The hostname of this Instance.
  • id string
    The ID of the Instance.
  • ipv4_addrs array
    The IPv4 address assigned to this Instance.
  • ipv6_addrs array
    The IPv6 address assigned to this Instance.
  • oper_status string UNDEPLOYED CHECK_DEPLOY_REQUIRED DEPLOYING UNDEPLOYING DEPLOYED_FS DEPLOYED UP DOWN BOOTING GOING_DOWN ORPHANED
    The current recognize Instance status.
  • org_id string
    The globally-unique identifier for the owning organization.
  • primary_mac_address string
    The primary MAC address of this Instance.
  • rm_serial_number string
    The serial number of the Resource Module hosting this Instance.
  • storage_pool string
    The storage pool of this Instance.

Paths

/api/instances
  • GET
    get
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/instances/{id}
  • GET
    get
    Path Parameters
    • id string
      id
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found

Resource Pools/api/resource_poolstop

A collection of all resource pools.

Resource

Resource Pool object
  • created string
  • default boolean
    A boolean value indicating whether this Resource Pool is the default for the account.
  • description string
    The description of the Resource Pool.
  • id string
    The globally unique identifier for the Resource Pool.
  • name string
    The account-local, friendly name of the Resource Pool.

Paths

/api/resource_pools
  • GET
    get
    Query Parameters
    • names array
      names
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
  • POST
    post
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 201 Created
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
/api/resource_pools/{id}
  • GET
    getById
    Path Parameters
    • id string
      id
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
    • 404 Not Found
  • DELETE
    delete
    Path Parameters
    • id string
      id
    Responses
    • 200 OK
    • 204 No Content
    • 401 Unauthorized
    • 403 Forbidden
